GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
PIRACY.
DNC 01.
M/V ATTACKED IN 03-55.29N 005-25.50E AT 192024Z OCT.
VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND
TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY
REPORTING CENTER, PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
